title: Martin Van Buren National Historic Site: Join Our Friends
body: Join Our Friends       The Friends of Lindenwald (FOL) is a not-for-profit all volunteer organization dedicated to bringing the life and lessons of our 8th president to our county and state as well as the rest of the U.S.A. through creative activities and programs.  To join the FOL please visit friendsoflindenwald.org or write: Friends of Lindenwald P.O. Box 64 Kinderhook, NY 12106   Find the Friends on Facebook at: https://www.facebook.com/friendsoflindenwald
